dc_title_s: Bartholomew's contour motoring map of India showing the main trunk touring roads
dc_description_s: Inset: environs of Bombay -- city of Bombay -- environs of Calcutta, etc.; Relief shown as gradient tints and heights in feet.; Shows: railways, roads (2 categories), canals, steamer routes.|82 centimeters x 88 centimeters|Scale 1:4,000,000|General Map Collection
